description: Spectrum Grant response message to the CBSD.

cbsdId.description: CBSD identifier as passed in the spectrum grant request.

grantId.description: A unique ID marking a spectrum grant originated from the SAS. If response.responseCode is non-zero, this must not be present.

grantExpireTime.description: RFC3339 date-time stamp indicating when the grant expires.

heartbeatDuration.description: Indicates an interval in seconds the CBSD should use between heartbeat requests.
